summary: TL* THE CONTACT'S GIRLFRIEND OWNS A 2007 PONTIAC G6. ON SEVERAL OCCASIONS, WHILE DRIVING, THE CONTACT HEARD A LOUD CLUNKING NOISE UNDERNEATH THE STEERING WHEEL. THERE WERE NO WARNING INDICATORS ILLUMINATED. THE CONTACT CALLED JACKSON CHEVROLET (LOCATED AT 660 S MAIN ST, MIDDLETON, CT 06457, (860) 316-4063) WHO STATED THAT THE FAILURE SOUNDED LIKE THE STEERING SHAFT. THE CONTACT REFERENCED NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 14E044000 (STEERING). THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 155,000.
